content.html:
I'm Ari Bader-Natal. I design, build, and operate online learning environments that help people access new opportunities and create new futures.
I am co-founder and CTO at Sparkwise, where I lead product and engineering. At Sparkwise, we help develop world-class teams and leaders through multiplayer challenges.
From 2019-2021, I served as the founding CTO at Calbright College. Calbright is a fully-online competency-based college in the California Community Colleges system designed for working adults who lack easy access to traditional forms of higher education.
Before this, I served as Chief Learning Scientist at Minerva Project. I joined Minerva as Employee #1 in 2012, and spent 7 years creating new tools to support learning and teaching, including Minerva's first Active Learning Forum, tools for formative assessment, and collaborative curriculum authoring system.
In 2010, I built Studio Sketchpad, a place for creative coders to collaboratively create interactive animations in Processing (and later P5.js.) In addition to serving as a venue for informal learning, Sketchpad has been used by 100+ universities, high schools, and coding workshops. Notably, this service has been running for 12+ years.

From 2019-2021, I served as the founding CTO at Calbright College.
Calbright is a fully-online competency-based college in the California Community Colleges system designed for working adults who lack easy access to traditional forms of higher education.

Before this, I served as Chief Learning Scientist at Minerva Project. I joined Minerva as Employee #1 in 2012, and spent 7 years creating new tools to support learning and teaching, including Minerva's first Active Learning Forum, tools for formative assessment, and collaborative curriculum authoring system.

note.value:
Ari Bader-Natal 

I'm Ari Bader-Natal. I design, build, and operate online learning environments that help people access new opportunities and create new futures.

https://favorites.aribadernatal.com/pock.title: I mentioned this to some startup founders, and the general reaction was “Wow, really?”—and further surprise that, worse, I do it entirely manually. There are no bots or automated email sequences behind the scenes. It’s literally just an email from me with a scheduling link, and I click send.

https://favorites.aribadernatal.com/twit.title: I am now slightly harder to fire. Lots of big feelings… especially gratitude! https://t.co/zvMlRejadc

You can run an entire personal ActivityPub server on Cloudflare Workers. In case you still thought it was just for rewriting headers or whatever.
I haven’t had the chance to set this up for myself yet but will be doing so soon… https://t.co/lSaa5c7AD9

https://favorites.aribadernatal.com/pock.title: I’ve been using computers for about two decades. I still have some of my oldest files; the earliest I can definitively date are from 2003, but I’m sure they aren’t the first things I made on a computer. Digital work is inherently ephemeral.
https://favorites.aribadernatal.com/pock.text: Web: You should take more screenshots

https://favorites.aribadernatal.com/pock.title: In the heart of every federal agency lies a dream of becoming the next DARPA—the folks that brought us advances like GPS and the internet.
https://favorites.aribadernatal.com/pock.text: Web: Innovation in the Education Sciences (the new IES)

https://favorites.aribadernatal.com/pock.title: Computation is a complex and fickle process. Which means that, particularly as our technologies get more complex, glitches and failures are an inevitability.
https://favorites.aribadernatal.com/pock.text: Web: ☞ The Edges Cases Where Computing and Physics Intersect

https://favorites.aribadernatal.com/twit.title: This is what I’ve been working on for the past few weeks! https://t.co/zOZqgdkonU

https://favorites.aribadernatal.com/mast.title: aribadernatal favorited a tweet by Greg Wilson: Prediction: the next big programming language will be the one that launches with a gajillion examples so that people using Copilot/ChatGPT can immediately have code generated for them. Co-prediction: only large companies will be able to launch new languages successfully in future. https://mastodon.social/@gvwilson/109802545919462625

https://favorites.aribadernatal.com/pock.title: Look at these graphs from a new paper tracking the test results of 7,000 learners across a wide variety of subjects. Each line shows the test scores of a student practicing a skill over a number of practice attempts (“opportunities”).
One day in late December, I downloaded a program called Whisper.cpp onto my laptop, hoping to use it to transcribe an interview I’d done.
https://favorites.aribadernatal.com/pock.text: Web: Whispers of A.I.’s Modular Future

https://favorites.aribadernatal.com/pock.title: Microsoft just released a new official plugin for the Elgato Streamdeck which provides you a host of meetings actions at your fingertips. In this video, recorded using Microsoft Teams, I walk through the integration and its uses/benefits.
https://favorites.aribadernatal.com/pock.text: Web: Using the Native Elgato StreamDeck Integration with Microsoft Teams

https://favorites.aribadernatal.com/pock.title: As economic conditions continue to be uncertain and hybrid poses a unique challenge to keep people connected, organizations everywhere are asking the question “How can we do more with less?” and are looking to optimize and consolidate for cost savings and efficiencies while accelerating growth
https://favorites.aribadernatal.com/pock.text: Web: Delivering new webinar experiences with Microsoft Teams
